# Security Policy

## Portfolio Project Notice
This is a portfolio/demonstration project. No versions are "supported" for production use.

## Reporting Security Issues
**DO NOT CREATE PUBLIC ISSUES FOR SECURITY CONCERNS**

If you find security issues in this educational code:
1. Email: zaynebsallamii@gmail.com
2. Subject: "Security Note: Devora Portfolio Project"

## Response
- Educational notes may be added
- No production fixes guaranteed
- Response within 5 business days

## Scope
This policy applies only to the code as a portfolio demonstration piece.
